item.title: Simba tango on Facebook
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: byÂ Spencer E Holtaway If you already subscribe in some way or another, skip this post entirely. I added a facebook page for Simba tango in case you would like to get updates from this blog there. Other subscription options include therss feed, rss feed for all comments, email subscription via feedburner and twitter. That’s all.
